examples.example: 我们一家人经常围坐在一起看电视，享受温馨的家庭时光。

translate.english: Our family often sit around and watch TV together, enjoying the warm family time.

examples.example: 我喜欢在闲暇时通过电视观看各种有趣的节目，丰富自己的生活。

translate.english: I like to watch various interesting programs on TV in my spare time to enrich my life.

examples.example: 我通过电视了解到了世界各地的风土人情，开阔了自己的视野。

translate.english: I learned about the customs and cultures around the world through the TV, and broadened my own vision.
